text: Sandro-Luca Molnar (born 23 August 2003) is an Austrian professional footballer. He plays as defender for 2. Liga (Austria) club Liefering. ==Career== Molnar started his youth career with the Styrian clubs SV Thal, Grazer AK and SK Sturm Graz. 2018 he came to the FC Red Bull Salzburg Academy. 2021 he went on to FC Liefering in Austrias Second League. ==International== Molnar played for Austrias U15 and U17 national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Liefering 2020–21 2.
